panels.title: Overview (updates based on top time selection)

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT sum(requests) as requests
    , count(distinct remote_ip) as visitors
FROM "$__table"
WHERE bucket IN (${bucket:sqlstring}) 
    AND http_status_group IN (${http_status_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))

SELECT $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}') as time
    , sum(case when http_status_group = '1xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_1xx
    , sum(case when http_status_group = '2xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_2xx
    , sum(case when http_status_group = '3xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_3xx
    , sum(case when http_status_group = '4xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_4xx
    , sum(case when http_status_group = '5xx' then requests else 0 end) as status_code_5xx
    , sum(bytes_sent) as bytes_sent
    , sum(object_size) as object_size
    , sum(total_time) as total_time
    , sum(turn_around_time) as turn_around_time
    , sum(requests) as requests
    , count(distinct remote_ip) as visitors
FROM "$__table"
WHERE bucket IN (${bucket:sqlstring}) 
    AND http_status_group IN (${http_status_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY $__unixEpochGroup(time / 1000, '${interval}');

SELECT bucket, operation, http_status_group, http_status, sum(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE bucket IN (${bucket:sqlstring}) 
    AND http_status_group IN (${http_status_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY bucket, operation, http_status_group, http_status

panels.title: Bytes Sent and Object Size History

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT remote_ip
    , SUM(requests) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE bucket IN (${bucket:sqlstring}) 
    AND http_status_group IN (${http_status_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND remote_ip != '-'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY remote_ip
ORDER BY requests DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT bucket
    , key
    , object_size
    , COUNT(1) as requests
FROM "$__table"
WHERE bucket IN (${bucket:sqlstring}) 
    AND http_status_group IN (${http_status_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND key != '-'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
GROUP BY bucket, key, object_size
ORDER BY requests DESC
LIMIT 500

SELECT timestamp
    , operation
    , bucket
    , key
    , version_id
    , object_size
    , remote_ip
    , http_status
    , error_code
FROM "$__table"
WHERE bucket IN (${bucket:sqlstring}) 
    AND http_status_group IN (${http_status_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND key != '-'
    AND operation like '%DELETE%'
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 500

SELECT timestamp
    , operation
    , bucket
    , key
    , object_size
    , remote_ip
    , http_status
    , error_code
FROM "$__table"
WHERE bucket IN (${bucket:sqlstring}) 
    AND http_status_group IN (${http_status_group:sqlstring}) 
    AND http_status_group IN ('4xx', '5xx')
    AND $__unixEpochFilter(time / 1000)
    AND (event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
        OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00'))
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 500

list.allValue: SELECT bucket FROM "$__table" WHERE  event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH') 	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00') GROUP BY bucket
list.label: Bucket
list.name: bucket

query.rawSQL:
SELECT bucket
FROM "$__table"
WHERE  event_hour BETWEEN  $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMddHH') AND  $__rawTimeTo('yyyyMMddHH')
	OR event_hour = $__rawTimeFrom('yyyyMMdd00')
GROUP BY bucket
